Team

Originally, SDAP represented a collaboration between NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory (JPL), Center for Ocean-Atmospheric Prediction Studies, Florida State University, the Computational Information Systems Laboratory (CISL) / National Center for Atmospheric Research (NCAR), and George Mason University (GMU). As the SDAP community expands, so will the happy faces below...

Contact

The best way to reach us is to contact us directly by email or to visit our GitHub Organization. Our geographically distributed team meets regularly by videoconference and collaborates on research and development primarily through our mailing list. You may view our messages on Google Groups or ask to join, however only invited people will be able to post.
